segments.title: Day 15 - Late Timeline
segments.description: You clock in. The manager immediately looks hostile. The kitchen feels worn, tense. You find notes in your apron you don't remember writing.
segments.environment: Worn, tense - equipment chipped, counters faded

segments.title: Day 1 - First Warning
segments.description: You wake up preparing for your first day. An unknown number calls. A voice warns: 'You're going to lose time.' You're confused, dismissive. You write your first note: 'Trust yourself'.

segments.title: Day 10 - Mid Timeline
segments.description: You notice you have FEWER notes than before. The schedule shows an earlier date. Confusion grows. A co-worker mentions finding a journal in storage.
segments.environment: Moderate wear - things look newer than last time

segments.title: Day 5 - Meeting the Guide
segments.description: Coffee shop. You meet the Guide face-to-face. 'I don't remember work at all,' you say. The Guide shows evidence of time gaps. You're learning about severance.

segments.title: Day 5 - Early Timeline
segments.description: The environment looks newer. Co-workers are friendly, chatty. The music is newly annoying. A customer gives a vague warning. Everything seems almost normal.

segments.title: Day 10 - Memory Collapse
segments.description: You wake up disoriented, hours missing. Your phone has photos you don't remember taking. A note from innie: 'I found the journal.' Both selves are working toward the same goal.

segments.title: Day 1 - The True Beginning
segments.description: Full tutorial. Everything is normal and optimistic. Manager introduces the playlist. No customer interactions yet. You realize: This was the beginning.

segments.title: Day 15 - Final Push
segments.description: Meeting with Guide, barely functional. 'Today is the convergence.' 'Do something kind, something human.' You encounter a stranger who needs help.

segments.title: Convergence
segments.description: Both timelines collapse. A co-worker collapses. You must choose: help or obey?
